Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan's batting concerns, particularly with Mohammad Rizwan and Babar Azam, and their bowling strengths featuring Shaheen Afridi, Shadab Khan, and Mohammad Wasim.
Bangladesh's batting struggles, with highlights on Litton Das and Nurul Hasan, and their bowling performance led by Taskin Ahmed and Hasan Mahmood.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Head-to-head statistics show Pakistan leading 15-2 in 17 matches.
The match will be broadcasted on Star Sports and Hotstar.
